attributes.action: ensure that an election is immediately called and sitting MPs banned from standing until they return to the taxpayer the expenses they have milked
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This country needs honest, decent, and honourable legislators who are reasonably paid for their duties.
Having lost all confidence in the present house, it is reasonable to see them gone in an immediate election but being unable to stand for election until they have paid back their expenses.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
